footer.ministry: Ministry of Science, Higher Education and Innovations of the Kyrgyz Republic

aboutUniversities.komissia: The composition of the selection committee

1.question: 1. What is the Automated Information System «Абитуриент Online» for?
1.title1: The automated information system «Абитуриент Online» was created in order to:
1.title2: Providing foreign applicants with the opportunity to apply for participation in the competition for admission to universities of the Kyrgyz Republic in electronic form;
1.title3: Familiarization, choice of university and specialty, as well as to provide feedback;
1.title4: Creation of a centralized accounting of submitted applications for participation in the competition, by automating the collection processes, as well as the formation of rating lists of applicants.

2.question: 2. What documents are required for admission to the university?
2.title1: The following documents are required for admission to the university:
2.title3: A document on education (certificate, certificate, certificate or diploma);
2.title5: Translation into Kyrgyz or Russian, international passport and education document certified by a notary;
2.title6: Certificate from the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic on compliance with the level of educational content (after selection).

3.question: 3. When will the competition for universities of the Kyrgyz Republic take place?
3.title1: The timing of the competition, each university independently indicates the time and place of the entrance examinations, follow the messages sent to you in your personal account or contact the responsible persons of the university for information, their contacts are indicated for each specialty.

4.question: 4. Can foreign students study for free at the universities of the Kyrgyz Republic?
4.title1: Yes, they can, only citizens of the states of Russia, Belarus, Kazakhstan and Tajikistan, with whom an agreement has been signed with the Kyrgyz Republic at the state level, for this you must pass the nationwide testing (ORT), you can find all the information at

5.question: 5. Are scholarships paid for international students?
5.title1: Yes, if you entered, through the ORT (paragraph 4.) for a budget form of education, and in other cases, foreign students are not provided with a scholarship.

7.question: 7. How to get a student visa?
7.title1: After passing the entrance examinations, an invitation is issued to obtain an entry student visa through the electronic portal of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Kyrgyz Republic
7.title2: Upon arrival, each student signs an agreement with the university, which specifies his rights and obligations. The contract is concluded at the beginning of the academic year.

8.question: 8. When should I submit the original documents to the admission committee of the university?
8.title1: You must submit the original documents at the beginning of the academic year.

9.question: 9 Can I come to the admissions office and the university and register for the competition there?
9.title1: Yes, you can, and even some universities have official «representatives» who will help you, just ask for a document confirming this, and you can also see the contact phone numbers of members of the university's admission committee for consultation in the system.

10.question: 10. Can I study at the university if I don't know Russian?
10.title1: Yes, you can, there are specialties with English, Kyrgyz and Turkish languages of instruction.

11.question: 11. I graduated from college in my country, can I enroll in your bachelor? What course will I study if I enter with a diploma?
11.title1: A special commission of the university, having studied your subjects, will determine your course.

portal.title: About the EduGate portal
portal.titleDesc: Unified digital portal for the admission of foreign citizens to higher education institutions of the Kyrgyz Republic
portal.eduGateDesc: — is a unified digital portal for the admission of foreign citizens to higher education institutions of the Kyrgyz Republic. It is a modern automated information system that significantly simplifies the admission process to universities of the Kyrgyz Republic for applicants from abroad.
portal.GoalsCardDesc1: The portal provides foreign applicants with the opportunity to submit applications for enrollment in universities of the Kyrgyz Republic online, without the need for personal presence at the initial stage.
portal.GoalsCardDesc2: The system automates the processes of collecting, recording and storing applicant data, creating a centralized database for forming lists of those recommended for enrollment.
portal.GoalsCard3Desc: Optimization of the work of university admission committees to improve the quality and transparency of the enrollment process for applicants in higher education institutions of the Kyrgyz Republic.
portal.GoalsCard4Desc: Providing complete and up-to-date information about universities, faculties, specialties, tuition fees and admission requirements.
portal.register3: Creating a personal profile with uploading required documents
portal.choosVuz2: Catalog of all higher education institutions of the Kyrgyz Republic
portal.choosVuz3: Detailed information about faculties and specialties
portal.choosVuz4: Information about forms of study and tuition fees
portal.submitOnline2: Submitting applications to multiple universities simultaneously
portal.submitOnline4: Tracking application status in real time
portal.admissionManagement1: Publishing information about specialties and admission plans
portal.admissionManagement2: Managing the composition of the admission committee
portal.documentManagement1: Verification and validation of applicant documents
portal.documentManagement2: Formation of invitations for obtaining visas
portal.documentManagement3: Maintaining a database of enrolled students
portal.monitoringControl1: Centralized monitoring of the admission process
portal.analytics1: Reports on the number of registered applicants
portal.analytics2: Enrollment statistics by fields of study
portal.openData1: The EduGate portal adheres to the principles of transparency and openness. The following information is available in the 'Open Data' section:
portal.openData3: Data on registration and enrollment in universities
portal.openData4: Information on the number of enrolled students by field of activity
portal.openData5: Rankings of universities of the Kyrgyz Republic
portal.forApplicants3: No need to come to the Kyrgyz Republic to submit documents
portal.forApplicants5: Application submission 24/7 from anywhere in the world
portal.forApplicants7: Tracking application status in real time
portal.forApplicants9: Complete information about universities and specialties in one place
portal.forApplicants13: Personal data protection and secure transactions
portal.forApplicants14: Start your path to education in the Kyrgyz Republic right now!
portal.forApplicants15: EduGate is your reliable partner on the path to higher education in the Kyrgyz Republic
